item.title: Getting Started with Semantic Kernel (Part 1)
item.description: Hi Everyone! With this post, I am starting a new series about Semantic Kernel. Over the time, I will updated this page with links to individual posts : This Post - Getting Started with Semantic Kernel (Part 1) What is Semantic Kernel? Semantic Kernel is a lightweight, open-source development kit that provides a framework for building AI applications using large language models (LLMs). It allows developers to create and manage complex workflows, integrate with various AI services, and leverage the power of LLMs in their applications.
